taskDescription: As a rule, axial alcohols oxidize somewhat faster than equatorial alcohols. Which would you expect to oxidize faster, cis-4-tert-butylcyclohexanol or trans-4-tert-butylcyclohexanol? Draw the more stable chair conformation of each molecule.
